Room.Name: Brownhaven Way/Caledonia Road
Room.ShortDescription: This is the intersection of Brownhaven Way and Caledonia Road.
Room.LongDescription: Brownhaven Way is a north-south street where most of the village's professional people maintain their offices. A few of the more genteel pubs are also found along Brownhaven Way. Caledonia Road is used mostly by merchants. A few second-hand stores can be found along the west road.
